wordpressPost.title: 2018-2019 Developing WebSites
wordpressPost.content:
• Websites design and development: I produced several sites for small Businesses in Guadeloupe creating custom templates from scratch or using wordpress themes and/or bootstrap depending on their needs.
  • Learning to use vanilla JS and different frameworks such as React and modern workflow tools : Saas, GitHub, Gulp, Npm, Node.js.
wordpressPost.excerpt: Websites design and development: I produced several sites for small Businesses in Guadeloupe creating custom templates from scratch or using wordpress themes and/or bootstrap depending on their needs. Learning to use vanilla JS and different frameworks such as React and modern workflow tools : Saas, GitHub, Gulp, Npm, Node.js.
